message.body: Hey it's Sam, let me know where you guys end up.
Oh hey! We're at a pub across the street from the courtyard thing. It's called Brits. It's chill, we're eating upstairs.
Sorry I couldn't make it by. Maybe see you in Philly?
No worries, dude. But yea, Philly :) I owe you a beer (or three) after all!
